Reviews.AuthorLocation: Ho Chi Minh City, null, Vietnam
Reviews.Title: “Good budget getaway hotel”
Reviews.Author: Brian H
Reviews.Content: This was a great place to stay in Little India. Close enough to some of the cultural attractions and easy to get to the MRT. The staff members were really helpful and were available 24 hours when we needed them. We had nice hot water, towels, hair dryer, and great service. Next to a 24 hour convenience store.

Reviews.Title: “Budget Hotel”
Reviews.Author: JohnPraveen
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 4 days..was a budget hotel, service was good, clean rooms (hot water, towels, dryer)...2 of our rooms had access to balcony...close to Bugis MRT. Very close to shops. There are red light activities in the hotel...

Reviews.Title: “Good enough budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: Trosete
Reviews.Content: Considering how expensive Singapore is, this is actually a good budget hotel. Clean, has basic necessities ( hot water, towels, dryer) and free wifi. Location is great. In front of sim lim, and 10 mins walk to Bugis MRT station. 10 mins may seem far but you'll be passing through the shopping district ( bugis st, and bugis junction) so the walk isn't really so bad. I would probably book there again for budget trips.

Reviews.Title: “Not so cheap budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: shane90
Reviews.Content: Stayed for only one night, arrived late in Singapore. Cleanliness is good but the rate is quite expensive for a 'budget hotel'. Room is nice though small. No window. A lot of 'red light' activities and really not suitable for families.

Reviews.Title: “Good and Convenient”
Reviews.Author: JanuaryIvy
Reviews.Content: Hotel 81 Rochor the perks : - great location - right in the middle of Little India and Bugis, very convenient - You have a choice which MRT station you can take and it's near the city center too. - near Arab Quarters too - service is quick and efficient (When we first arrived in our room, it was dirty - there were hair scattered all over the floor. I went down to the Front Desk and asked to have our room cleaned. After a few minutes, they sent someone who swept and cleaned our room. So, I give them points for service. Plus, every time we asked our room to be tidied, it was always done well. No repeat incidences of uncleanliness.) - safe negatives: - the room is small but it will do if you are out all day and then just need a room to sleep in it during the night (if i may add, not as small as I expected it to be though) - the room was dirty when we checked in (but it was alright during the next few days of our stay) - only provided 1 bottled water although our booking was good for 2 adults - no cable television - but it does have a dvd player the lowdown: This hotel is great for the budget traveler who wants a more private accommodation than a backpacker inn. It meets the basic necessities but doesn't have anything more special to offer. My experience was a pleasant one. I would stay in this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible Value.”
Reviews.Author: EricF32655
Reviews.Content: Hotel 81 Rochor is a decent budget hogged. However, it doesn't charge budget prices. We were very disappointed with what we got for $80 USD a night. We requested windows and got a room without windows. The other guests were extremely loud - slamming doors in the hallways at 1am and bizarre things like that. The hotel did nothing about it. The room lacked furniture, so we couldn't unpack. Housekeeping short-sheeted the beds several times and we had to ask for proper sheets. The ones they used barely fit the bed - which was uncomfortable. WiFi was good seed, but booted us out after three minutes of inactivity. Overall, not what we would expect for the money. At $40 less a night, it might have been a decent deal.

Reviews.Title: “Best Value for Money”
Reviews.Author: cabalaji97
Reviews.Content: I think this hotel is the best place for value for money. You have complete peace with walking distance from the market. Even though the hotel is small, it is good for those who stay for short time say one to 2 days. You have manu restaurants for food nearby areas with a lot of variety and hence no food in the hotel makes very less difference. Good hotel for budget travellers.

Reviews.Title: “Small room, no windows”
Reviews.Author: HolleyT
Reviews.Content: We only stayed here for one night as we were passing through Singapore. Definitely a good hotel for a night but not for an extended stay. The rate was relatively cheap and the location fairly central. The lobby looks clean and new, as do the rooms at a first glance. On a closer look the bathroom was actually quite grimy. Again, fine for a night, not for an extended stay.

Reviews.Title: “So bad I'm still laughing”
Reviews.Author: Kiandora
Reviews.Content: Hotel 81 was horrible to the extent that you couldn't help but laugh. As you step out of the elevator you have the sudden feeling of being stuck inside of Wonderland with Alice. The poorly decorated tiled hallways did little to hide the fact that the floor was slanted and upon entering the room you felt like you had suddenly grown to four times your size. Yes it was that little. The rooms are tiny and offer very little. Sure there is a TV and DVD player but apart from that the decor is very below standard. The bed felt like I was sleeping on a giant leather bound book, it was that uncomfortable and slippery. We even had to make our own bed as the sheets had not been placed on the bed properly. They didn't even fit on the bed. The bathroom was the worst. The shower consisted of a shower head protruding from the wall in such a fashion that you could actually sit on the toilet and shower at the same time, actually a part of me is still convinced that that is what was intended. Water ended up everywhere, soaking the entire bathroom. Even the windows were covered in a strange green sheet and they couldn't be opened at all. Letting sunlight in the room gave the effect of being in the Emerald City in the Land of Oz. Very strange hotel. Would not recommend for anyone wanting a good night's sleep.

Reviews.Title: “good budget”
Reviews.Author: kambing99
Reviews.Content: great hotel, cheap enough, been stay in this hotel twice, once in standard once in superior. Standard room is smaller. Superios room with twin bed. Bed is amazingly narrow, watch where you sleep, you could fell off. But other than that everything is perfect, furniture and furnish is brand new and completely functioning, LCD tv. No window on very room I think, they cover the windows with green sheets. Aircon works OK, bathroom abit small but good and clean. Location is very good close to everywhere, particularly closed to simlim for IT shopping and bugis. Will definitely stay there again.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel 81 Rochor
HotelInfo.Address: Jalan Besar 5, Singapore 208785, Singapore
